Internet Applications Timeline

1968

Telnet

Content

Connecting remote computers

1980

FTP

Content

Transferring files between computers

1982

SMTP

Content

Sending messages between computers

This protocol is used by Email.

1986

NNTP

Content

Distributing news to newsgroups

1989

HTTP

Content

Transferring hypermedia content between computers.

This technology underlies websites and mobile applications.
